doc.value: Related actions profile for RWMBook. Clients SHOULD use the link marked rel='related' to get a list of all the available related actions. The contents of the list SHOULD reflect the context of the client and the service.
The URL of the most recently used action
The link relation value of an available related action. This value SHOULD also include the link relation value of 'related'
Human readable title associated with the link
Represents one or more link elements containing the available related actions
Home represents any current document or starting point in the flow
A safe, idempotent action to return to the Home document
An optional safe idempotent action to list the Related links as a response.
